channel.title: fujisan on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in fujisan on Barefoot Rob

item.title: (not) Climbing Mt Fuji tonight
item.description: 20:05 Monday 21 September 2015 JST Lin and I are leaving soon for Mt Fuji, which we plan to begin climbing around midnight. We have no specific goal to reach the top at a certain time (or really at all).. but just to climb until we decide it’s time to dash down the gravel scree sliding area which I love and Lin does not. 00:38 Tuesday 22 September 2015 JST We drove 15km in 30 minutes, then 1.
